name: Urban Champion (Wii U)
description:
The mean streets have a new force to deal with: you!

Don't let the big, bad bully of the neighborhood push you around! Find
out if you have what it takes to make it on the rough city streets
against the toughest brawlers around. Use a combination of punches to
knock your opponent backward into an open manhole before time expires.
If you fall, a shower of confetti will celebrate your enemy's victory -
leaving you with your wounded pride. Watch out for angry neighbors who
will attempt to drop flowerpots on your head. The police will also make
an occasional appearance to temporarily break up the fight - or to make
an arrest if time runs out. Spar against a computer bully or a friend
and prove your worth in becoming the Urban Champion!
